title: Using deadband in packet-based networked control systems
abstract: A packet-based deadband control approach is proposed for Networked Control Systems (NCSs). Within the packet-based control framework for NCSs, the proposed deadband control strategy takes full advantage of the packet-based data transmission in NCSs, and thus considerably reduces the use of the communication resources in NCSs whilst maintaining the system performance at a satisfactory level. The stability conditions of the closed-loop system are obtained and a numerical example illustrating the effectiveness of the proposed approach is presented
